document_data.name: ''Prestigious Chromatic Vestments''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Prestigious chromatic vestments''''' were enchanted [[robe]]s that belonged to the [[aarakocra]] people of [[Kir Sabal]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Chromatic vestments'' were made out of uncannily light material of shivering colors that moved as if underwater.
document_data.Powers: The enchantments placed on this set of robes made the wearer hard to strike, with the physical impact of hits dispersed as if fighting a [[water elemental]].
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Asharra]]: the [[aarakocra]] [[wizard]] leader of Kir Sabal in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
